# IfcConversionUnitInformation.ShortStringPrefix method

Converts the given SI prefix to its corresponding short string (e.g. k for KILO)

```csharp
public static string ShortStringPrefix(SiPrefix prefix)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| prefix | the SI prefix |

## Return Value

the associated short string prefix (e.g. k, m, da)
